# [`/.github/workflows`]

## Purpose

GitHub Actions workflows that run tests on each push and pull request.

## Contents

### Files

* **[`ci.yml`](./ci.yml)** – Defines the continuous integration pipeline

## Usage

Workflows run automatically in GitHub when branches are pushed or when pull
requests are opened.

## Related modules

* [`../`](../) – GitHub configuration root
* [`../../README.md`](../../README.md) – Project overview
